<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    package="com.mediatek"
    coreApp="true"
    android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system">

    <!-- ================================================ -->
    <!-- Special broadcasts that only the system can send -->
    <!-- ================================================ -->
    <eat-comment />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.SCREEN_OFF" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.SCREEN_ON" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.USER_PRESENT" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.TIME_TICK" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.TIMEZONE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.BOOT_COMPLETED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_INSTALL" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_ADDED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_REPLACED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_REMOVED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_RESTARTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PACKAGE_DATA_CLEARED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.UID_REMOVED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.CONFIGURATION_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.LOCALE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.BATTERY_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.BATTERY_LOW" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.BATTERY_OKAY" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_POWER_CONNECTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_POWER_DISCONNECTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_SHUTDOWN" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.DEVICE_STORAGE_LOW" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.DEVICE_STORAGE_OK" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.NEW_OUTGOING_CALL" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.REBOOT" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.DOCK_EVENT" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_PHONE_RESTART" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.PHB_STATE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_WORLD_MODE_CHANGED" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.app.action.ENTER_CAR_MODE" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.app.action.EXIT_CAR_MODE" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.app.action.ENTER_DESK_MODE" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.app.action.EXIT_DESK_MODE" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.backup.intent.RUN" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.backup.intent.CLEAR" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.backup.intent.INIT" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.adapter.action.STATE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.adapter.action.SCAN_MODE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.adapter.action.DISCOVERY_STARTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.adapter.action.DISCOVERY_FINISHED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.adapter.action.LOCAL_NAME_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.FOUND" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.DISAPPEARED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.CLASS_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.ACL_CONNECTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.ACL_DISCONNECT_REQUESTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.ACL_DISCONNECTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.NAME_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.BOND_STATE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.NAME_FAILED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.PAIRING_REQUEST" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.bluetooth.device.action.PAIRING_CANCEL" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_EF_RAT_CONTENT_NOTIFY" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_EF_CSP_CONTENT_NOTIFY" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.phone.ACTION_COMMON_SLOT_NO_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="mediatek.intent.action.ACTION_UNLOCK_SIM_LOCK" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.android.phone.ACTION_SIM_RECOVERY_DONE" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.provider.Telephony.SMS_STATE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.server.action.ACTION_POLICY_CREATED" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.internal.omh.cardcheck" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.wfd.connection" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.clearmotion.DIMMED_UPDATE" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.search.SEARCH_ENGINE_CHANGED" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.NO_CERTIFICATION" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.WIFI_CLEAR_NOTIFICATION_SHOW_FLAG_ACTION" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.NEW_PAC_UPDATED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.PPPOE_COMPLETED_ACTION" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.PPPOE_STATE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.TDLS_CONNECTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.TDLS_DISCONNECTED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.android.wifi_off_notify" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.android.server.WifiManager.action.STOP_HOTSPOT" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.WIFI_HOTSPOT_CLIENTS_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.wifi.WIFI_HOTSPOT_CLIENTS_IP_READY" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.wifi.p2p.Tx" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.wifi.p2p.GO.GCrequest.connect" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.wifi.p2p.OP.channel" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.wifi.p2p.freq.conflict" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.wifi.p2p.crossmount.intention" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.lbs.action.NLP_BIND_REQUEST" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.location.providercheck" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.net.conn.DATA_ACTIVITY_CHANGE_CT" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.conn.MMS_CONNECTIVITY" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.network.socketconn" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_RAT_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="mediatek.intent.action.LOCATED_PLMN_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_NETWORK_EVENT" />

    <!-- THE INTENT of STK UserActivity -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.stk.USER_ACTIVITY" />

    <!-- Action used for HDMI cable plug event -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.HDMI_PLUG" />

    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.RADIO_STATE_CHANGED" />

    <!-- Action for OP01 WiFi plugin -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.mediatek.common.wifi.AUTOCONNECT_SETTINGS_CHANGE" />

    <!-- Action used for uplink data shaping -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="mediatek.intent.action.LTE_ACCESS_STRATUM_STATE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="mediatek.intent.action.PS_NETWORK_TYPE_CHANGED" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="mediatek.intent.action.SHARED_DEFAULT_APN_STATE_CHANGED" />

    <!-- Action used for IPO & ShutdownThread -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_PRE_SHUTDOWN" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_SHUTDOWN_IPO" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.black.mode" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_PREBOOT_IPO" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_BOOT_IPO" />

    <!-- Action used for USB C2K -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.via.bypass.action.setbypass_result" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="com.via.bypass.action.getbypass_result" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="via.cdma.action.set.ets.dev" />

    <!-- Action used for Thermal & ShutdownThread -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.THERMAL_DIAG" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.THERMAL_WARNING" />
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.THERMAL_SHUTDOWN" />

    <!-- Allows applications to write the apn settings -->

    <!-- Action used for RunningBoosterService -->
    <protected-broadcast android:name="android.intent.action.ACTION_START_RUNNING_BOOSTER" />

    <!-- This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global
         search system to access their data.  Typically it used when the
         provider has some permissions protecting it (which global search
         would not be expected to hold), and added as a read-only permission
         to the path in the provider where global search queries are
         performed.  This permission can not be held by regular applications;
         it is used by applications to protect themselves from everyone else
         besides global search. -->
    <permission android:name="android.permission.GLOBAL_SEARCH"
        android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS"
        android:protectionLevel="signatureOrSystem" />

    <!-- Internal permission protecting access to the global search
         system: ensures that only the system can access the provider
         to perform queries (since this otherwise provides unrestricted
         access to a variety of content providers), and to write the
         search statistics (to keep applications from gaming the source
         ranking).
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="android.permission.GLOBAL_SEARCH_CONTROL"
        android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS"
        android:protectionLevel="signature" />

    <!-- Allows applications to set a live wallpaper.
         @hide XXX Change to signature once the picker is moved to its
         own apk as Ghod Intended. -->
    <permission android:name="android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_COMPONENT"
        android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS"
        android:protectionLevel="signatureOrSystem" />

    <!-- Allow an application to read and write the cache partition.
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="android.permission.ADVANCED_WIDGET_API"
        android:protectionLevel="normal" />

    <!-- Allows an application to wakeup system when it is in suspend mode
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="com.mediatek.permission.WAKE_DEVICE_SENSORHUB"
        android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY"
        android:protectionLevel="dangerous"
        android:label="@string/permlab_wake_device_sensorhub"
        android:description="@string/permdesc_wake_device_sensorhub" />

    <!-- Must be required by default container service so that only
         the system can bind to it and use it to copy
         protected data to secure containers or files
         accessible to the system.
         @hide -->


    <!-- C2DM permission.
         @hide Used internally.
     -->

    <!-- @SystemApi Indicates that this OMAPI Terminal is a "system terminal".
        <p>Not for use by third-party applications.
        @hide -->
    <permission android:name="org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SYSTEM_TERMINAL"
                android:protectionLevel="signature|system"
                android:label="@string/permlab_systemTerminal"
                android:description="@string/permdesc_systemTerminal" />

    <!-- @SystemApi Permission used by SmartcardService to be able to bind to
        system terminals.
    <p>Not for use by third-party applications.
        @hide -->
    <permission android:name="org.simalliance.openmobileapi.BIND_TERMINAL"
                android:protectionLevel="signature|system"
                android:label="@string/permlab_bindTerminal"
                android:description="@string/permdesc_bindTerminal" />

    <!-- Allows an application to initiate a conference phone call
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="com.mediatek.permission.CTA_CONFERENCE_CALL"
        android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.PHONE"
        android:permissionFlags="costsMoney"
        android:label="@string/permlab_cta_conference_call"
        android:description="@string/permdesc_cta_conference_call"
        android:protectionLevel="dangerous" />

    <!-- Allows an application to send MMS
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="com.mediatek.permission.CTA_SEND_MMS"
        android:permissionGroup="android.permission-group.SMS"
        android:label="@string/permlab_cta_send_mms"
        android:description="@string/permdesc_cta_send_mms"
        android:protectionLevel="dangerous" />

    <!-- Allows an application to send email
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="com.mediatek.permission.CTA_SEND_EMAIL"
        android:permissionGroup="com.mediatek.permission-group.EMAIL"
        android:label="@string/permlab_cta_send_email"
        android:description="@string/permdesc_cta_send_email"
        android:protectionLevel="dangerous" />

    <!-- Allows an application to enable wifi state
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="com.mediatek.permission.CTA_ENABLE_WIFI"
        android:permissionGroup="com.mediatek.permission-group.WIFI"
        android:label="@string/permlab_cta_enable_wifi"
        android:description="@string/permdesc_cta_enable_wifi"
        android:protectionLevel="signatureOrSystem" />

    <!-- Allows an application to enable bluetooth state
         @hide -->
    <permission android:name="com.mediatek.permission.CTA_ENABLE_BT"
        android:permissionGroup="com.mediatek.permission-group.BT"
        android:label="@string/permlab_cta_enable_bt"
        android:description="@string/permdesc_cta_enable_bt"
        android:protectionLevel="signatureOrSystem" />

    <!-- Used for runtime permissions related to wifi settings.
         @hide -->
    <permission-group android:name="com.mediatek.permission-group.WIFI"
        android:icon="@drawable/perm_group_wifi"
        android:label="@string/permgrouplab_wifi"
        android:description="@string/permgroupdesc_wifi"
        android:priority="1000" />

    <!-- Used for runtime permissions related to bluetooth settings.
         @hide -->
    <permission-group android:name="com.mediatek.permission-group.BT"
        android:icon="@drawable/perm_group_bluetooth"
        android:label="@string/permgrouplab_bt"
        android:description="@string/permgroupdesc_bt"
        android:priority="1100" />

    <!-- Used for runtime permissions related to email settings.
         @hide -->
    <permission-group android:name="com.mediatek.permission-group.EMAIL"
        android:icon="@drawable/perm_group_email"
        android:label="@string/permgrouplab_email"
        android:description="@string/permgroupdesc_email"
        android:priority="1200" />

</manifest>
